original_text: Now if he were on earth, he would not be a priest at all, since there are priests who offer gifts according to the law.
korean_text: 예수께서 만일 땅에 계셨더라면 제사장이 되지 아니하셨을 것이니 이는 율법을 따라 예물을 드리는 제사장이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: Now if he were on earth
he would not be a priest at all
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 전혀 제사장이 되지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who offer gifts according to the law
